channel.title: Adding start off screen
channel.description:
Could anyone please explain what to put in client.java to make a screen appear when people logg in saying Server created by Jac bla bla bla
Can you please also explain where to put it

item.title: Adding start off screen
item.dc:creator: @bonzakid bonzakid
item.description:
@bonzakid wrote:

Thats pretty sad you don’t know it. But here it is from my old server…

public void writePlayers() { int players = PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount(); sendFrame126(" @whi@Unb0rn Fury", 6570); sendFrame126("@cya@Owner : Bonzakid", 6572); sendFrame126(" @gre@Players Online: " + players, 6664); setInterfaceWalkable(6673);//6673 }

Read full topic

item.title: Adding start off screen
item.dc:creator: @jac jac
item.description:
@jac wrote:

Umm… like its a purplish screen when people logg in and in a banner at the top it says (servername)
in the centre it says server created by (name)
at the bottem it says forums site… latest updates…

Read full topic

item.title: Adding start off screen
item.dc:creator: @itzkyle Lusfr
item.description:
@itzkyle wrote:

public void VOIDNAME HERE() { sendFrame126("@dre@Itzscape v3 Server 7.0 - Help Menu", 8144); clearQuestInterface(); sendFrame126("", 8145); sendFrame126("@dbl@Welcome to @cya@Itzscape v3 Server 7.0", 8146); sendFrame126("@dbl@Itzscape v3 Server 7.0 - No spawning", 8147); sendFrame126("@dre@Site: @dbl@http://moparisthebest.com/smf@dbl@", 8148); sendFrame126( "@dre@Obtaining items: @dbl@All good gear/cash are dropped by npcs.", 8149); sendFrame126( "@dre@Noob Monsters: @dbl@Rats by bank and Soldiers by bank.", 8150); sendFrame126( "@dre@Mid Monsters: @dbl@Druids, Moss giants, west of rats.", 8151); sendFrame126( "@dre@High Monsters: @dbl@Heroes (far west), Dad (70 cb+ Boss).", 8152); sendFrame126( "@dre@Dungeon (red key): @dbl@Fire giants, San Tojalon (Boss).", 8153); sendFrame126("@lre@- - - PKING WITH DROPS! by Bakatool - - -", 8154); sendFrame126("@dre@Pking: @dbl@Type ::pking to start pking a match!", 8155); sendFrame126( "@dre@Pking if died @dbl@You may use Teleport in Aubury to come back.", 8156); sendFrame126("@red@Warning! @dbl@You WILL lose items pking!", 8157); sendFrame126("", 8158); sendFrame126("@lre@Premium Member coming soon!", 8159); sendFrame126("", 8160); sendFrame126( "@dre@Phats/Crackers: @dbl@Discontinued, you can buy off of players.", 8161); sendFrame126("@dre@Other rares: @dbl@Santa hats, discontinued.", 8162); sendFrame126("", 8163); sendFrame126("", 8164); sendFrame126("", 8165); sendFrame126("", 8166); sendFrame126("", 8167); sendFrame126("", 8168); sendFrame126("", 8169); sendFrame126("", 8170); sendFrame126("", 8170); sendFrame126("", 8170); sendQuestSomething(8143); showInterface(8134); }
replace the writing with what you want then call the method when you login
